title: High-Entropy Alloys for Advanced Structural Applications: A Review
journalOrConference: Materials Science and Engineering: R: Reports
abstract: This review summarizes the recent advancements in high-entropy alloys, focusing on their unique microstructures, mechanical properties, and potential applications in extreme environments. We discuss various synthesis routes and characterization techniques, highlighting key challenges and future directions in the field.

title: Machine Learning Approaches for Predicting Battery Performance Degradation
abstract: We present a comprehensive study on the application of various machine learning models to predict the degradation behavior of lithium-ion batteries. Our models, trained on extensive cycling data, show high accuracy in forecasting capacity fade and resistance increase, enabling proactive battery management.

title: Enhanced Photocatalytic Activity of Graphitic Carbon Nitride/TiO2 Composites
abstract: This work explores the synthesis and characterization of novel g-C3N4/TiO2 composite materials for improved photocatalytic degradation of organic pollutants. We demonstrate significantly enhanced efficiency under visible light irradiation, attributing it to synergistic effects.

title: Quantum Mechanical Simulations of Defect Formation in Perovskite Solar Cells
abstract: Using density functional theory, we investigate the energetics and electronic effects of various point defects in hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites. Our findings provide insights into stability issues and strategies for defect passivation in high-efficiency solar cells.

title: Review on Additive Manufacturing of Biomedical Implants
journalOrConference: Journal of Biomedical Materials Research Part B: Applied Biomaterials
abstract: Additive manufacturing (AM) offers unprecedented design freedom for patient-specific biomedical implants. This review covers the state-of-the-art in AM techniques, materials, and challenges in fabricating implants with complex geometries and enhanced biocompatibility.

title: Data-Driven Materials Discovery: A Computational Perspective
journalOrConference: Computational Materials Science: Methods and Applications
abstract: This book chapter explores the role of data-driven approaches in accelerating materials discovery, with a focus on machine learning and high-throughput computational methods. Case studies in alloy design and energy materials are presented.

title: Technical Report on Scalable Quantum Computing Architectures
journalOrConference: Advanced Materials and Data Computing Group Technical Report
abstract: This technical report outlines the design and simulation of scalable quantum computing architectures using novel materials. We discuss implementation challenges and propose solutions for fault-tolerant systems.

title: Novel High-Entropy Alloy Composition for Structural Applications
abstract: This patent describes a novel high-entropy alloy composition with enhanced strength and corrosion resistance for structural applications in extreme environments.

title: Photocatalytic Coating for Environmental Purification
abstract: This patent covers a novel photocatalytic coating design based on g-C3N4/TiO2 composites for efficient degradation of organic pollutants under visible light.

title: Design for a Biomedical Implant with Enhanced Biocompatibility
abstract: This design patent covers the unique geometric configuration of a biomedical implant optimized for enhanced biocompatibility and mechanical stability.
